summary: SummaryLancÃ´me's Clarifique Pore Refining Cleanser is a pore-refining cleanser to remove impurities, improve dullness, refresh skin, and improve uneven tone and texture.
details: DetailsBenefitsRemoves impurities, improves dullness, refreshes skin & improve uneven tone and textureRefines skin texture, making it appear smoother and more even-tonedSuitable for all skin types, including sensitiveKey IngredientsSalicylic acid: Known to help improve the appearance of pores, skin tone & textureBeech Bud extract: Known to exfoliate the skinLicorice root extract: Known to help improve skin tone & soothe the skinItem 2632957How To UseApply a small amount of cleanser to damp skin, gently massaging in circular motions to remove makeup and impurities.Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water and pat skin dry.To enhance tone, texture, and dullness, use Clarifique Brightening Serum, followed by your favorite moisturizer, and UV Expert Defense SPF 50+ during the day.Can be used day and night.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Coco-Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Rosa Centifolia Extract/Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract/Licorice Root Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Mentha Piperita Extract/Peppermint Extract, Fagus Sylvatica Bud Extract, Glycol Distearate, Peg-14m, Sodium Hydroxide, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-39, Butylene Glycol, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Salicylic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Benzoic Acid, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Parfum/Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of cleanser to damp skin, gently massaging in circular motions to remove makeup and impurities.Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water and pat skin dry.To enhance tone, texture, and dullness, use Clarifique Brightening Serum, followed by your favorite moisturizer, and UV Expert Defense SPF 50+ during the day.Can be used day and night.
ingredients: Rosa Centifolia Extract/Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract
Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract/Licorice Root Extract

reviews.headline: Didn't care for this
reviews.comments: I only bought this because they were out of my preferred face wash. This product burned my skin and I didn't care for the smell of the face wash either.

reviews.headline: Sooo worth it 10/10!!
reviews.comments: A little goes a long way, skin looks clearer it has less texture but doesn't feel dry after i cleanse in love with this definitely a must have for everyday use

reviews.comments: Not sure if it shrunk my pores as it claimed. But I like how it feels on my face.

reviews.headline: Great product, bad package
reviews.comments: Tube wont close. Product itself is great.

reviews.headline: This is great!
reviews.comments: This is a new cleanser from Lancome and it seems to be aimed to brighten skin a refine pores. I noticed it mentioned it is for all skin types. My skin type is normal but HYPERsensitive. While it has fragrance it is not harsh. It is a green scent, not like grass but it smells like a plant (perhaps the beech extract). You only need a small amount for a generous foam. It doesn't burn the eyes or leave my face feeling tight. I do wish Lancome would make more unscented products (especially genefique!). I see a difference in my skin after using it for a week! Its a big bottle and should last a long time.
